items.sentence: I wonder how Tom manages to stay so young-looking.
I'm looking forward to receiving letters from you.
Read the kinds of books that you find interesting.
How many times will you have to go to the dentist?
I'm not talking to you. I'm talking to the monkey.
The person reading a book over there is my father.
Learning a foreign language requires perseverance.
If it hadn't been raining, we'd have had more fun.
A few students in my class played hooky yesterday.
The food was really good the last time I was here.
I've already been told I'm not allowed to do that.
It'll be hard to do that with your arm in a sling.
I have no idea what Tom would be capable of doing.
The phone rang three times before Tom answered it.
Losing my daughter has taken away my will to live.
The novel has been translated into many languages.
You're expected to be here until 2:30, aren't you?
I didn't receive any Christmas presents this year.
I didn't know that there was a swimming pool here.
Tom said some inappropriate things to his teacher.
